title: ICYMI - James Corden on Hosting "The Late Late Show" and Having a Blast at the Tony Awards
itunes:title: ICYMI - James Corden on Hosting "The Late Late Show" and Having a Blast at the Tony Awards
description:
"The Late Late Show" host James Corden talks about the origin of his wildly popular Carpool Karaoke segment, his love of theater and hosting the 2019 Tony Awards.
